# componentName

**Instance Property**

The audio unit’s component’s name.

## Declaration

```swift
var componentName: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

By convention, an audio unit’s component name is “[doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AUAudioUnit/manufacturerName]: [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AUAudioUnit/audioUnitName]”.

## Describing the Audio Unit

- **componentDescription**: The component description with which the audio unit was created.
- **component**: The component found in the component description with which the audio unit was created.
- **componentVersion**: The audio unit’s component’s version.
- **audioUnitName**: The audio unit’s name, derived from the component’s name.
- **audioUnitShortName**
- **manufacturerName**: The manufacturer’s name, derived from the component’s name.
